H0.text: They have the same genotype and phenotype, because both brothers have brown eyesâ€”one brother carries the B and b alleles (Bb) and the other carries only the B allele (BB).

H1.text: They have different phenotypes and genotypes, because one brother carries both the B and b alleles while the other carries only the B allele, and both brothers have brown eyes in humans.

H2.text: They have the same phenotype but different genotypes, because both brothers have brown eyes while one brother is B/b and the other is B/B.

H3.text: They have the same genotype but different phenotypes, even though one brother has both B and b alleles and the other only has B alleles, yet both display brown eyes in humans where B is the allele for brown eyes and b for blue eyes.

A4.text: If the individual has the BB or Bb genotype, then they produce hair and the hair color phenotype can be observed, but if the individual has a bb genotype, then the person is bald which masks the A gene entirely.
